title: The Bearless City
description: In Waterford, Michigan, a young boy named David is afraid of bears. David’s grandpa tells a story about how he fought all of the bears and made the bears leave their town. David felt good knowing his grandpa could save the small city in Michigan from mean and big bears. Find out what happens when David notices a bear on his way home from school. Can David’s grandpa save Waterford from this grizzly bear?
author: Aimee Stinson
